Articles.Content: I just got kerbal space program enhanced edition and I cant find out how to do a crew report.

U click on the commandpod with the cicrle or square button depending on your preset. Same buttons for xbox but i dont have the controllerlayout in my memory. Scroll down in the part action window until u see a button "crew report", click on that with the X button. And welcome to the forums

Edited November 22, 2018 by PrvDancer85
